overview: Mr. Campbell is a registered architect and a licensed surveyor. John started building towers in 1992 in the Virgin Islands. His company eventually expanded to Puerto Rico, where he started the Puerto Rico Tower Company. After building over 300 towers and a portfolio of over 20 collocation towers, Mr. Campbell sold his company and moved to Idaho. He and his wife started the Idaho Tower Company in 2001. Mr. Campbell handles site design, construction, and strategic planning.
